body_html:
Master is already changed to use that image, you do not need to edit
anymore.

On Oct 21, 2016 2:28 AM, "Peter Waller" notifications@github.com wrote:

In the minimal reproduce in the original post, it says:

  1. Modify devel-gpu to read "FROM nvidia/cuda:8.0-cudnn5-devel".

Did you guys do that?

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
